title: Mercury in Leo
summary: Communication takes on a confident, expressive tone. Messages favor storytelling, bold declarations, and being heard. The opportunity is to lead with warmth and clarity without overshadowing others.

meaning.headline: Voice wants to shine and be recognized.

frames.text: Mercury in Leo elevates dramatic flair, creative language, and statements delivered with conviction.
It can inspire others when paired with generosity and listening.
Pride in ideas can motivate follow-through when tied to purpose.
Clarity improves when you focus on the core message rather than embellishment.
Being outspoken guarantees approval or leadership.

frictions: Taking feedback as a threat to identity
Centering personal story in every discussion
opportunities: Bringing warmth to otherwise dry topics

do: Lead with the headline and the heart of the story.
Invite others to contribute and credit them.
Check that tone matches audience needs.
Translate passion into specific next steps.
Use confidence to advocate for shared goals.
avoid: Ignoring data that complicates your narrative

reusable_lines.text: Speak boldly, and pair it with space for response.
Confidence carries best when it serves the story, not the spotlight.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can boost confidence in communication
Agency-forward language: you choose how to share the stage
Contextual framing: expressive tone helps when anchored in substance

sources: Mercury as mind/communication archetype in daily cycles
